snippet: The claim comes after a long effort to secure the territory, and mineral rights, to Arctic Ocean seabed, including an area under the North Pole.
abstract: Russia presents revised claim to Arctic Ocean seabed, including area under North Pole, to United Nations; successful bid could grant Russia mineral rights in region.
lead_paragraph: The claim comes after a long effort to secure the territory, and mineral rights, to Arctic Ocean seabed, including an area under the North Pole.

headline.main: Russia Presents Revised Claim of Arctic Territory to the United Nations
headline.print_headline: Russia Makes U.N. Claim to Arctic Ocean Seabed
